pageTitle: Bakerloo line suspended north of Stonebridge Park station due to engineering works

title.title: Bakerloo line suspended north of Stonebridge Park station due to engineering works

texts: The Bakerloo line will be suspended from Stonebridge Park to Harrow & Wealdstone on 14 August, in connection with Network Rail engineering works taking place between Stonebridge Park and Watford Junction.
Two replacement Bus Services will operate:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["A: Between Stonebridge Park and Harrow \u0026 Wealdstone","B: Between Harrow \u0026 Wealdstone and Watford Junction"]}
A bus service will operate on Monday morning from Watford Junction to Stonebridge Park.
Passengers travelling to/from the following stations to Central London are advised to use the following routes:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Harrow \u0026 Wealdstone Silverlink County services to/from Euston","Kenton Metropolitan line services to/from Northwick Park","Wembley Central Silverlink County to/from Euston"]}
Customers are advised to allow an extra 30 minutes to complete their journeys, especially those wishing to make last train connections.

For 24-hour information on all London travel, please call: 020 7222 1234 or visit TfL's website:
www.tfl.gov.uk

Live information on TfL's Realtime pages displays latest updates to London's transport modes, including the Tube, DLR, bus and Network Rail
www.tfl.gov.uk/realtime

Journey Planner checks the transport network's status before providing results. The best available route will be shown automatically
www.tfl.gov.uk/journeyplanner
Travel alerts via SMS and email can be set up at www.tfl.gov.uk/alerts

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Metronet Rail BCV is responsible for the maintenance and renewal of the Bakerloo, Central, Victoria and Waterloo \u0026 City lines","TfL is investing Â£10bn over the next five years to improve and expand London's transport network, over half of that in the Tube","The Bakerloo line runs for 23km from Elephant \u0026 Castle in the south to Harrow \u0026 Wealdstone in the north","The line was opened in stages between 1906 and 1915","Maida Vale station on the Bakerloo line was the first London station to have all-female staff when it opened on 6 June 1915"]}
